name: Lake at Night

ingredients.name: Senior & Co. The Genuine Blue Cura√ßao

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with cubed ice
Shake and double strain into a chilled coupe or Nick and Nora glass
Garnish with an orange twist or peel
Steep 2 to 3 teaspoons loose Lapsang souchong leaves in 6 ounces hot water for 2 to 3 minutes
Drain the water and add 25.4 ounces (750 milliliters) vodka
Steep the leaves in the vodka at room temperature for 5 to 7 minutes
Drain and discard the leaves before the tea is over extracted
If left too long, the spirit will become overly tannic and woody
Decant into a clean container or bottle
Store in a cool place away from sunlight
